text: It is necessary to go on boasting. Though it is not profitable, I will go on to visions and revelations from the Lord.

I <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> a <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> who <st data-num="1180" class="">fourteen</st> <st data-num="2094" class="">years</st> <st data-num="4253" class="">ago</st> (<st data-num="1535" class="">whether</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st> <st data-num="1535" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1622">out of</st> the <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st> I do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st>, <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">knows)</st> was <st data-num="726">caught up</st> <st data-num="2193" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="5154" class="">third</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> I <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> that <st data-num="5108" class="">this</st> <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> (<st data-num="1535" class="">whether</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st> <st data-num="1535" class="">or</st> <st data-num="5565">apart from</st> the <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st> I do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st>, <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">knows)</st>

was <st data-num="726">caught up</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="3857" class="">paradise</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="731">things too sacred</st> to be put into <st data-num="4487" class="">words</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3739">things that</st> a <st data-num="444" class="">person</st><n id="3" /> is <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1832" class="">permitted</st> to <st data-num="2980" class="">speak</st>.

<st data-num="5228" class="">On behalf of</st> <st data-num="5108">such an individual</st> I will <st data-num="2744" class="">boast</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> on <st data-num="1683">my own</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">behalf</st> I will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2744" class="">boast</st>, <st data-num="1508">except</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">about</st> my <st data-num="769" class="">weaknesses</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> even <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> I <st data-num="2309" class="">wish</st> to <st data-num="2744" class="">boast</st>, I will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> a <st data-num="878" class="">fool</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> I would be <st data-num="3004">telling</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> I <st data-num="5339" class="">refrain</st> from this so that <st data-num="3361" class="">no</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">one</st> may <st data-num="3049" class="">regard</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">beyond</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> he <st data-num="991" class="">sees</st> in <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">what</st> he <st data-num="191" class="">hears</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>,

<st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> because of the <st data-num="5236" class="">extraordinary character</st> of the <st data-num="602" class="">revelations</st>. <st data-num="1352" class="">Therefore</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2443" class="">so that</st> I would <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5229" class="">become arrogant</st>, a <st data-num="4647" class="">thorn</st> in the <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st> was <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, a <st data-num="32" class="">messenger</st> of <st data-num="4567" class="">Satan</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2852" class="">trouble</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>—<st data-num="2443" class="">so that</st> I would <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5229">become arrogant</st>.<n id="3" />

I <st data-num="3870" class="">asked</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="5151" class="">three times</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">about</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st>, <st data-num="2443" class="">that</st> it would <st data-num="868" class="">depart</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">But</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, “<st data-num="1473" class="">My</st> <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st> is <st data-num="714" class="">enough</st><n id="2" /> for <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> my<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1411" class="">power</st> is <st data-num="5055">made perfect</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="769" class="">weakness</st>.” <st data-num="3767" class="">So then</st>, I will <st data-num="2744" class="">boast</st> <st data-num="3123" class="">most</st> <st data-num="2234" class="">gladly</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">about</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="769" class="">weaknesses</st>, <st data-num="2443" class="">so that</st> the <st data-num="1411" class="">power</st> of <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> may <st data-num="1981" class="">reside</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">in</st><n id="6" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.
Therefore I am content with weaknesses, with insults, with troubles, with persecutions and difficulties for the sake of Christ, for whenever I am weak, then I am strong.
I have become a fool. You yourselves forced me to do it, for I should have been commended by you. For I lack nothing in comparison to those “super-apostles,” even though I am nothing.

<st data-num="3303" class="">Indeed</st>, the <st data-num="4592" class="">signs</st> of an <st data-num="652" class="">apostle</st> were <st data-num="2716" class="">performed</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">great</st> <st data-num="5281" class="">perseverance</st><n id="1" /> by <st data-num="4592" class="">signs</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5059" class="">wonders</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1411">powerful deeds</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">how</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> you <st data-num="2274" class="">treated worse</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">than</st> the <st data-num="3062" class="">other</st> <st data-num="1577" class="">churches</st>, <st data-num="1508">except</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="846" class="">myself</st> was <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> a <st data-num="2655" class="">burden</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>? <st data-num="5483" class="">Forgive</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="93" class="">injustice</st>!

<st data-num="2400" class="">Look</st>, for <st data-num="3778">the</st> <st data-num="5154">third time</st> I <st data-num="2192" class="">am</st> <st data-num="2093" class="">ready</st> to <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> I will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> be a <st data-num="2655" class="">burden</st> to you, <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> I do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2212" class="">want</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3588">possessions</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>. <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="5043" class="">children</st> should <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3784">have</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="2343">save up</st> for their <st data-num="1118" class="">parents</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1118" class="">parents</st> for their <st data-num="5043" class="">children</st>.

<st data-num="1161">Now</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> will <st data-num="2234">most gladly</st> <st data-num="1159" class="">spend</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> be <st data-num="1550" class="">spent</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="5590" class="">lives</st>!<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> I <st data-num="25" class="">love</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="4056" class="">more</st>, am I to be <st data-num="25" class="">loved</st> <st data-num="2276" class="">less</st>?

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> that as it may, <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> have <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2599" class="">burdened</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>. <st data-num="235" class="">Yet</st> because I <st data-num="5225" class="">was</st> a <st data-num="3835">crafty person</st>, I <st data-num="2983" class="">took</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> in by <st data-num="1388" class="">deceit</st>!

I have <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4122" class="">taken advantage</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> I have <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, have I?<n id="1" />

I <st data-num="3870" class="">urged</st> <st data-num="5103" class="">Titus</st> to visit you,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> I <st data-num="4882" class="">sent</st> our<n id="2" /> <st data-num="80" class="">brother</st> <st data-num="4882" class="">along with</st> him. <st data-num="5103" class="">Titus</st> did <st data-num="3385" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4122" class="">take advantage</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, did he?<n id="3" /> Did we <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4043" class="">conduct</st> ourselves in the <st data-num="846" class="">same</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st>? Did we <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2487">behave</st> in the <st data-num="846" class="">same way</st>?<n id="4" />

Have <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> been <st data-num="1380" class="">thinking</st> <st data-num="3819">all this time</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> we have been <st data-num="626" class="">defending</st> ourselves to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>? We are <st data-num="2980" class="">speaking</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2713" class="">before</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everything</st> we do, <st data-num="27">dear friends</st>, is to <st data-num="3619" class="">build</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3619">up</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> I am <st data-num="5399" class="">afraid</st> that <st data-num="4458" class="">somehow</st> when I <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> I will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2147" class="">find</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3634">what</st> I <st data-num="2309" class="">wish</st>, <st data-num="2504" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> will <st data-num="2147" class="">find</st> me<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3634">what</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2309" class="">wish</st>. <st data-num="3361">I am afraid that</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4458" class="">somehow</st> there may be <st data-num="2054" class="">quarreling</st>, <st data-num="2205" class="">jealousy</st>, <st data-num="2372" class="">intense anger</st>, <st data-num="2052" class="">selfish ambition</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2636" class="">slander</st>, <st data-num="5587" class="">gossip</st>, <st data-num="5450" class="">arrogance</st>, and <st data-num="181" class="">disorder</st>.

I am afraid that when I come again, my God may humiliate me before you, and I will grieve for many of those who previously sinned and have not repented of the impurity, sexual immorality, and licentiousness that they have practiced.
